add_phone_desc:
add a phone to receive notifications.
You will receive receive a confirmation sms
auto_lock_desc: request your PIN / Fingerprint / FaceID each time you open the application
biometric_lock_desc: allow the use of your fingerprint / Face ID as a means of security
confirm_logout: Are you sure you want to logout?
confirmation_code_description: enter the confirmation code using your security card
enter_add_phone_confirmation: enter the confirmation code received at %s
gps_not_authorized: activate the GPS and authorize "Monujo" to use it to locate you
gps_not_enabled: activate the GPS to allow "Monujo" to locate you
hint_userpicker: Input a name,email or account number
invalid_authentication: the username/password specified is not valid

plist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Monujo needs your camera to scan QRCodes
plist.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: Monujo uses biometric services to secure your transactions

loggedout_due_to_fingerprint_change:
it looks like you changed your fingerprint / FaceID.
For security reasons you need to reconnect
newpro_channel_name: notifications for new pros around you
newpro_notifications_desc:
receive a notification when a new professional member arrives near you. 
You can limit these notifications by distance to your address
no_google_play_services:
Your phone does not appear to support Google Play Services.
Therefore you cannot receive notifications
password_change_required: for security reasons it is necessary for you to change the temporary password which was given to you during your account creation
password_reset_confirmation: you will receive an email with instructions to reset your password
payment_notifications_desc: receive notifications when you receive payment a transfer
phone_added: phone number %s has been added correctly
privacy_policy_desc: important notes about the privacy of your data
received_paiement_body: You received a paiement from %1$s of %2$s Monujos!
send_bug_report_desc: enter an email and a description of the bug encountered
send_crash_reports_desc: crash report only contains relevant information for us in order to identify problems and fix it.
source_code_desc: get the app source code on Github
support_desc: get help from us or the community
wrong_password_confirmation:
error when changing password. 
Check that you have confirmed the password
wrong_scancode: the scanning code is not an Monujo code
